caption: MITRE Technique
description: The MITRE Technique object describes the ATT&CK® or ATLAS™ Technique ID and/or name associated to an attack.
name: technique

name.description: The name of the attack technique. For example: Active Scanning or AI Model Inference API Access.

src_url.description: The versioned permalink of the attack technique. For example: https://attack.mitre.org/versions/v14/techniques/T1595/.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the attack technique. For example: T1595 or AML.T0040.
